channel.title: Port forwading + no owner
channel.description:
Hi, all of my friends.. are saying they can't connect to my server... and i read in another post that you need to port forward youre server, how do i do that?
-Also when i connect im not set as admin/owner
If you could help with 1 of these please post. Thanks

item.title: Port forwading + no owner
item.dc:creator: @icevfire icevfire
item.description:
@icevfire wrote:

port forwarding ive found a guide but im stuck on some part where they used there modem I.P in the adress bar
cos mine is completly diffrent to theres (talktalk) and they went into applications and gaming and mine doesnt have that
do u know how i should do?

this is the link im following it from - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html - after ive gone onto
www.portforwarding.com i dont know where to find applications and gaming

Read full topic

item.title: Port forwading + no owner
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

go to the file “characters” in ur source then u should see the name u made
click it… and u shouild see player rights make urself 1 is lowest 3 is highest… i suggest when you do that keep loggin in and out untill your crown is there… also have you portfowarded?

Read full topic
